subject: re:Can't be a lover anymore?
body:
Dear valued member.
With this special pharmaceutical bulletin we introduce MyCanadianPharmacy providing high quality products at low cost.
MyCanadianPharmacy provides drugs at a cost well below our American counterparts. 
For more information click herehttp://dresslie.hk
Purchase your products with the most respected Canadian drugstore and you will have no chance to be scammed. Our service is friendly, fast and guaranteed.
Yours faithfully,Richard De
